metadata.title: CVE-2024-25817 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in eza before version 0.18.2, allows localattackers to execute arbitrary code via the .git/HEAD, .git/refs, and.git/objects components.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

eza - 0.18.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rust-eza package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.2-1').
